name: Calcifer Knitted Plushie
full_text: MATERIALS: 11g of Ricorumi DK colour 29 (dark red)* 7g of Ricorumi DK colour 28 (redish orange)* 4g of Ricorumi DK colour 27 (orange)* 8g of Ricorumi DK colour 26 (yellow)* 1g of Ricorumi DK colour 56 (light brown) 12g of Ricorumi DK colour 67 (dark brown) 1g of Ricorumi DK colour 60 (black) < 1g of Ricorumi DK colour 2 (white) 3.50 mm circular or double pointed needles Black embroidery thread Tapestry needle Stuffing Important note: I decided to cut the yarn and tie a knot at most colour changes. If you decide to run the yarn throughout the project you will need more of these colours. GAUGE: Width: 24 sts = 10 cm Height: 38 rows =10 cm ABREVIATIONS: K = knit Sts = stitches Kfb = knit in the front and back loop * * = repeat what is between the asterisks until the end of the round
